title: SfG Basel
content:
SFG, Schule für Gestaltung Basel (Basel School of Design)

Famous design school in Switzerland.  
Located in Basel in the German-speaking north west region of Switzerland.

Teachers were (amongst others): Jan Tschichold, Emil Ruder, Armin Hofmann, Max Mathys, Wolfgang Weingart, Kurt Hauert.
